name: Custom pyrography portrait of You or anyome You might want.
description:
Yourselt, your special someone or anyone else want their portrait burned in wood? I can do that!
I can burn any picture on a block of plywood in pyrography technique. A paper picture may last a long time, but a picture burned like this would last forever.
All i need is a decent sized (and sharp) photo and some time. Please allow for a week between reciving the photo and shipping the picture.

The default price is for an a4 size block and one face. Other sizes are also available!

name: Hand crafted pyrography picture of the monkey god Hanuman.
description:
This is a picture of the mighty hindu monkey god Hanuman
Done all by hand in pyrography (or woodburning) technique, on a 7-layer plywood plate. The quality and detail of the image is hand crafted and of course excellent.

The size of the plate is 20x26 cm. Other sizes are negotiable. The item is made to order and personalized (with a greeting or wish) if necessary.
This item is made to order, which means that upon purchase it will take about 4-5 days until it's finished and ready for mailing.

name: Custom hand-crafted pyrography picture of Ganesha
description:
